title.narrative: Global Eco-Industrial Parks Programme - Peru: Country Level Intervention

description.narrative: ..Under Component of the Global Eco-Industrial Park Programme (GEIPP) tailor-made EIP country level interventions in Colombia, Peru, Ukraine and Vietnam are to be developed and implemented. The country level EIP interventions have to follow a uniform approach and to deliver 2 outcomes: Outcome 1: EIP incentivised and mainstreamed in relevant policy and regulations leading to an increased role of EIP in environmental, industry and other relevant policies at the national levels in the participating Programme countries. Outcome 2: EIP opportunities identified and implementation started, with environmental (e.g. resource productivity) economic and social benefits achieved by enterprises confirmed. The implementation of EIP opportunities by enterprises and other organisations will be supported by the EIP services providers, and will lead to reduction of the environmental footprint and operational and compliance costs of businesses, and an increase in their - natural - resource productivity
